name: In Gravity We Trust
description:
The Working People Jam 2021

https://itch.io/jam/the-working-people-jam

In Gravity We Trust

This our entry for the gamejam The Working People Jam 2021, with the theme Unexpect. For this gamejam, we decided to do a take on the good old Tetris, but with a twist. Can you find it?

It was a great fun to do, and, while not complete, we are still proud of it. Enjoy our code!

You can play it here
